Submit Your Recipe

JadiVegan is looking for new recipes and wants to feature YOURS on the JadiVegan website! Got a recipe that's been passed down in the family? A new recipe you came up with?

By submitting any content for consideration, you agree to the JadiVegan Materials Release

View Recipe

Recipe Details

Please put each ingredient and its measurement on its own line.

Please put each instruction/step on its own line.

Please put each tips on its own line.

Photo Guidelines

Please follow these guidelines when uploading a photo. Your recipe may be rejected if your photo does not meet the guidelines.

Do's

  • Landscape (horizontal) photos
  • Photos including your dish

Dont's

  • No portrait (vertical) photos
  • No people or pets in your photo
  • No personal information (name, age, etc.)
  • No content that violates our User Agreement
or

Your information will be displayed as anonymous (You don't need to fill the recipe credit form)
